translation.zh: ‎麦克德莫特先生和太太 很荣幸…

translation.en: Oh! Come here! Come here!
Let's forget the formalities, shall we? "Mr. McDermott," all that crap.
translation.zh:
‎别客套 好吗？
‎别叫我“麦克德莫特先生”

translation.en: -Yeah. -Call me Billy.
Okay, Billy.
Oh, well, you must be Parker's dad because you two kiss exactly the same.
translation.zh:
‎你肯定是帕克尔的爸爸
‎因为你们俩亲起来一模一样

translation.en: -I'm Lilly. -Hey, Lilly.
-Yeah, thanks, that's good. -Okay, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎嗯 谢谢 这样就行 ‎-好的
‎-妈？

translation.en: -[Parker] Mom? -[Billy] Oh, look who's here!
-[Lilly] Aw, baby! Oh, my God! -Dad? What?
translation.zh:
‎-看看谁来了！
‎-宝贝！ ‎-爸？啊？
‎-太好了！

translation.en: [Parker] You're here! What are you doing here?
Yeah, the flight was early, and, uh… Actually, you were singing.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 航班提前了 ‎对了 你刚才在唱小曲儿

translation.en: I heard you singing a little ditty about boinking our daughter.
-[Parker] Really? -[both agreeing]
Uh, just a little ditty that I was doing in private.
Didn't know it was, uh, in front of my future in-laws.
translation.zh: ‎没想到会当着我未来岳父母的面唱

translation.en: -How'd… How'd you guys get in? -The door was unlocked.
That is weird, 'cause I never forget to lock the front door.
translation.zh: ‎好奇怪 我从来不会忘记锁前门

translation.en: Are you calling my wife a liar? Huh?
[yelling] You calling my wife a liar? Is that it?
I just walk in here and now you're accusing her?
translation.zh: ‎我刚进来 你就要说她坏话？

translation.en: You want me to hit your face--
[wincing] You were joking! It's a joke!
It's a joke! It's a joke! Okay!
So, how do you like your prezzies?
translation.zh: ‎对了 给你们的礼物喜欢吗？

translation.en: I'm wearing it, aren't I?
Well, should we tell them our story? We have a really cute meet-cute.
translation.zh: ‎要不要把我们的故事跟他们说？ ‎我们相遇特别浪漫

translation.en: It's, uh, you're gonna love this story.
There's one thing you need to know about me, my family has hip issues.
translation.zh: ‎关于我 有一件事你们得知道 ‎我们家有髋关节毛病

translation.en: And, obviously, wanted to get ahead of it.
translation.zh:
‎所以当然就想提前想办法
‎于是去看医生

translation.en: Went to the doctor. She said, "Have you tried yoga?"
translation.zh:
‎所以当然就想提前想办法
‎于是去看医生 ‎医生说：“你尝试过瑜伽吗？”

translation.en: -[Billy chuckles] -[Owen] Got a coupon. Went to my first yoga class…
translation.zh:
‎于是拿了一张优惠券
‎去上了我的第一堂瑜伽课

translation.en: -It was my class. -[laughing]
I was teaching the class! I mean, what are the odds?
translation.zh:
‎是我的课 上课的是我！ ‎-多巧啊？对吧？
‎-很夸张

translation.en: -Crazy! -Right?
[chuckles] That's amazing.
So then I noticed that halfway through the class, Owen's in child's pose.
translation.zh:
‎然后我注意到
‎课上到一半 欧文呈婴孩式姿势

translation.en: Yep. Okay, so get this.
Okay, I'm in child's pose.
And while I'm in child's pose, I pass out, but no one notices. Look.
translation.zh:
‎在这个姿势下 我昏了过去
‎但是没人发现 ‎看 就是这样
‎如果我昏过去 别人根本看不出

translation.en: [laughing] Look. If I was unconscious right now, you couldn't even tell.
translation.zh:
‎看 就是这样
‎如果我昏过去 别人根本看不出

translation.en: -[Parker] Right? -[Billy] Oh, yeah.
So then everyone leaves, class is over,
and I notice that Owen's still in child's pose.
translation.zh: ‎我发现欧文还是呈婴孩式姿势

translation.en: And I think to myself,
"Oh, fuck. This guy just died. He's dead. He's a goner."
translation.zh: ‎“妈的 这人死了 没气了”

translation.en: -Mmm-mmm. But I didn't. -[Parker] Nope.
Then, when Parker unfolded me, and I came to,
translation.zh: ‎然后帕克尔把我拉直 我醒了过来

translation.en: I looked up at her big, beautiful smile, and I realized…
translation.zh: ‎我看着她灿烂而美丽的笑容 ‎我心想：“我一辈子都要和她在一起”

translation.en: "This is the woman I'm gonna spend the rest of my life with."
translation.zh: ‎我心想：“我一辈子都要和她在一起”

translation.en: -And you were right. -Yes, I was.
-And then you asked her out. -No, actually.
I went to her class for a year and a half and she finally asked me out.
translation.zh:
‎我上她的课一年半之后
‎她终于约我出去

translation.en: ♪ Honey dew, honey dew, honey dew ♪
♪ Honey dew, honey dew, honey dew ♪
[scoffs] I can't find anyone to cover my class, so I'm just gonna have to cancel.
translation.zh: ‎找不到人给我代课 我只能取消了

translation.en: -[Owen] Mmm-mmm. -Make sure my parents are okay.
I'm not gonna let you get in trouble at work.
translation.zh: ‎我可不能让你在工作上有麻烦

translation.en: I have 178 sick days already saved up. I already called in.
translation.zh: ‎我攒了178天病假 已经请假了

translation.en: -It's not about-- No-- Actually, babe-- -I got you, don't worry about it!
translation.zh:
‎不是这个问题… ‎-不要 宝贝…
‎-交给我吧 别担心

translation.en: -Don't worry, I got it! Oh, hey! -[Lilly] Aw!
-Good morning, future family. -[Parker] Hi!
translation.zh:
‎-早上好 未来女婿
‎-早上好

translation.en: -Good morning! Morning, Dad. -[Billy] Nice to see you. Good morning.
So I have to go into work today, but Owen is taking his first day off
translation.zh:
‎我今天得上班 ‎但是欧文请了假
‎这是他进银行工作之后第一次请假

translation.en: since he started at the bank, he's gonna show you guys around.
translation.zh:
‎但是欧文请了假
‎这是他进银行工作之后第一次请假 ‎他会带你们到处逛逛

translation.en: -Right, babe? -[Owen] Exciting!
I don't like my tushy touched, and she finds it hilarious.
translation.zh: ‎我不喜欢别人碰我屁股 ‎不过她觉得这样很好玩

translation.en: -I do! -It scares me… something about it.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-吓死我了 我对这个很敏感

translation.en: -All right, well, I'll see you tonight. -Okay. Bye.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 晚上见
‎-好的 再见

translation.en: -You two, behave. All right? Be nice. -[Billy] Bye, bye, darling.
translation.zh:
‎你们俩乖点 好吗？要乖乖的 ‎-回头见 亲爱的
‎-他很爱我

translation.en: -[Parker] It means a lot to him. Be good. -Love you. We'll be good.
translation.zh:
‎-回头见 亲爱的
‎-他很爱我 ‎-乖点
‎-爱你噢 我们会乖乖的

translation.en: -[Owen] Bye! Love you! -Bye!
Okay! Oh! You want some OJ? Good. Good, good, good. [Billy] I do.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 要喝橙汁？好的
‎-很好喝

translation.en: So, hope you guys are hungry,
because I've got…
baked eggs Florentine. We have some roasted-- [hooting wildly]
translation.zh: ‎佛罗伦萨烤鸡蛋 还有烤…

translation.en: [laughing] Got in there deep.
Okay, uh… Well, enough about breakfast.
I hope you're ready to have some fun because I got us tickets
translation.zh: ‎精彩的还在后面 ‎我给你们准备了南美陶艺展的门票

translation.en: to a South American pottery exhibition.
translation.zh: ‎我给你们准备了南美陶艺展的门票

translation.en: Why?
Because you guys were living with the Yanomami tribe in the Amazon…
translation.zh:
‎因为你们之前在亚马逊丛里
‎和亚诺马米部落一起生活

translation.en: Oh! Oh, yeah.
…who obviously are known for their exquisite pottery.
translation.zh: ‎他们的精美的陶艺作品非常出名

translation.en: We spent so many years with that tribe that we're all potteried out.
translation.zh:
‎我们和部落一起生活了那么多年
‎都看烦了

translation.en: All right, well, let's go to the next step of our adventure.
translation.zh: ‎好的 那我们进入下一个精彩环节

translation.en: The Holocaust Museum!
Honestly, I've been there, like… I would… They've got an amazing food court!
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我去过 ‎那里的美食区很棒

translation.en: Okay! Look, we're not into pottery and we're not into Holocaust awareness.
translation.zh:
‎好吧
‎对陶艺和纪念大屠杀都不感兴趣

translation.en: Fine. What do you guys want to do?
[Owen screaming] Pull the chute! Pull the chute!
[Billy] Not until you convince me why I should let you marry my daughter!

‎你得先说服我
‎为什么要把女儿嫁给你！

translation.en: [Owen] Oh, God! She's my best friend, and I love her!
translation.zh:
‎神啊！她是我最好的朋友
‎而且我爱她！

translation.en: Oh, God! Oh, God!
-I dog sit! I tip 20%! -Not good enough!
translation.zh:
‎-我会照顾狗！我小费给20%！
‎-还不够！

translation.en: [Owen dejectedly] I'll never have sex with her again.
-[Billy] Keep going! -I'm pulling the cord!
[Billy] That's my cock, you idiot!
You know, I was thinking about choosing a Shrek character,
translation.zh:
‎我考虑选怪物史莱克
‎因为这是我最喜欢的角色

translation.en: because it's my favorite, but I don't know,
translation.zh:
‎我考虑选怪物史莱克
‎因为这是我最喜欢的角色 ‎但是这月亮也很吸引人啊 对吧？

translation.en: this moon is really speaking to me, right?
translation.zh: ‎但是这月亮也很吸引人啊 对吧？

translation.en: Okay. That looks pretty--
Ow! What? What--
Let's go! Oh, man.
Could you guys believe I got a tattoo?
[laughing] Who even am I right now? This is a tattoo, it's a moon.

translation.en: [imitates howling] I'm like a wolf.
Bill, why don't you get us another round? I'm not nearly drunk enough.
translation.zh:
‎比利 要不你再给我们点一轮酒？
‎我离喝醉还差很远

translation.en: That's a good idea, Lilly.
I'll come with! Let's go!
Mind the shoes, Owen.
My bad, Mister Dad. [laughing]
Okay, that one was a little on you,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 刚才你也有点责任

translation.en: 'cause you didn't turn around that quickly. That's okay.
translation.zh: ‎因为你转身不太快 没事

translation.en: -[Billy] Sit! -Yeah.
Stay. Okay!
-I'll be right back. -[Billy] Oh, no.
I'll go. You keep him company. All right?
[Owen] God! He is just the coolest, isn't he?
It is so awesome that you get to have sex with him.

translation.en: -Really? -And he smells so good!
translation.zh:
‎-是嘛？
‎-而且他身上的味道很好闻！

translation.en: It smells like… sandalwood and… and danger.
-It's Stetson. Cologne. -Is that what that is?
How you doing, big fella?
Nice to see you again, Billy. You look hella fine.
translation.zh:
‎太好了 又和你见面了 比利
‎你气色很好嘛

translation.en: Ah, if you say so.
So tell me, what does a bank manager do, exactly?
translation.zh:
‎对了 跟我说说
‎银行经理到底干什么？

translation.en: What does a bank manager not do?
I manage all of the employees.
And we have 12.
Really?
And I handle all the security, the whole dang bank.
translation.zh:
‎而且我还要管所有安全方面的工作
‎管整间银行

translation.en: -How did you find us? -That little cunt over there.

-Did he? -New colleague?
Uh, no, he's just a family friend.

translation.en: He's an idiot. Doesn't know what's going on.
translation.zh: ‎他是个笨蛋 不了解情况

translation.en: He looks like a fucking idiot.
-Yup. -[Owen] Billy!
That guy rocks!
Yuck.
Jesus, there you are. Oh, you smell like my stepdad's car.
translation.zh:
‎哎呀 你在这里
‎你闻起来好像我继父车上的味道

translation.en: [man] So, uh, how did it go with your in-laws?
translation.zh: ‎对了 你和岳父母相处得怎么样啊？

translation.en: Was it regular bad, or like really, really terrible?
It was incredible.
I've never met anyone like these people before.
We went skydiving.
We got very drunk.
I did a little dancing.
I finally felt like I was part of the cool crowd in high school,
translation.zh: ‎我终于体验到了炫酷高中生的感觉

translation.en: like I'm a skateboarder, or like I vandalize stuff or something.
translation.zh:
‎就好像自己是滑板手
‎或者会搞破坏什么的

translation.en: I don't, but it feels like I could.
translation.zh:
‎我不干这样的事
‎但感觉就像我能做出这样的事

translation.en: It was fun. It was almost too much fun.
translation.zh: ‎很开心 几乎开心得有点过头了

translation.en: Let's just pray to the banking gods that we have a nice, chill day.
translation.zh: ‎我们向银行之神祈祷今天万事顺利

translation.en: [robber distorted] Everyone, on the ground, now!
Ground! Let's go! -Move! -[yelling]
[robber] Go.
You, hurry up.
Get down! Get down!
[robber] Two minutes.
[sputtering] Look, listen, listen. I am fully cooperating in every way.
translation.zh: ‎听我说 我完全配合你们

translation.en: And in that spirit, I have to let you know
that this is a state-of-the-art, completely impenetrable security system.
translation.zh: ‎这保安系统非常先进 不可能突破

translation.en: And there is no way you can pass there in under two--
translation.zh: ‎你们不可能在两分钟内进入…

translation.en: [sputtering] That was an extremely lucky guess.
So you know about the fingerprint bypass?
However, this is where our journey ends, because there's--
translation.zh: ‎无论如何 到这里也就结束了 因为…

translation.en: [robber] Shut up! Read.
How did you--
[robber] Read!
"She left me roses by the stairs."
[robber] Don't fuck with me. Do not fuck with me!
♪ She left me roses by the stairs ♪
[robber 1] "Surprises let me know she cares."
translation.zh: ‎“意外之余 我知道了她心有我”

translation.en: [robber 2] Thirty seconds.
-Thanks for letting me out. -[robber] You're welcome.
In there.
-[Owen] Okay! Okay! -Fill that up.
Did you want any small bills in case you have to tip or anything?
translation.zh: ‎要不要放点小面额的给小费用？

translation.en: [robber] Shut the fuck up!
Sandalwood? And danger.
[robber] Faster, move!
Stop smiling at me.
Enough.
Time.
Hey. Hey, look, you know, it's not too late to do the right thing.
translation.zh: ‎哎 听我说 现在收手还来得及

translation.en: [Owen] I'm sorry.
[robber] Thank you for your cooperation, everyone. Especially you, Owen.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢各位的合作 尤其是你 欧文

translation.en: You!
[man] They had on top-notch body armor, they had on face mask.
translation.zh: ‎他们有最好的身体护甲 戴着面罩

translation.en: Stuff I've never seen before, and I know about a lot of good stuff.
translation.zh: ‎那些东西我见都没见过 ‎好东西我见过很多

translation.en: The type of training I did… [laughs] I know when I see bad guys walking in.
translation.zh:
‎我接受了很多培训
‎看到坏人进来 我立刻就发现了

translation.en: So I tried to stop 'em myself, but, um… [clears throat] I slipped.
translation.zh: ‎于是我上前阻止 但是滑倒了

translation.en: Could we not write that down?
[Marisol faintly] I ain't see shit, I don't know shit, I don't talk to cops.
translation.zh:
‎我什么都没看到 什么都不知道
‎我不和警察多说

translation.en: [Gary faintly] …a million times, I can't find the latch.
translation.zh: ‎已经无数次了 我找不到逃生开关

translation.en: You deal with the security?
[exclaims] I'm the boss!
It's the best job in the world.
You're adorable.
The first part is a numerical code and it's my childhood phone number.
translation.zh:
‎第一部分是数字密码
‎是我小时候的电话号码

translation.en: -[Lilly] Good one. Of course. -It's 402-896-6860. It's easy.
♪ By the stairs ♪
You gotta get a little nasally, act like you're British, but you're not.
translation.zh:
‎要有点鼻音
‎好像自己是英国人 但其实又不是

translation.en: They're from San Diego.
Owen? Oh, my God! But--
translation.zh: ‎欧文 天呐！怎么弄成这样？

translation.en: Are you okay?
[exclaims] We came as soon as we heard. -"We"? -[mysterious music playing]
translation.zh:
‎-我们听说之后马上就赶来了
‎-“我们”？

translation.en: [Oldham] I'm Special Agent Roger Oldham, FBI.
translation.zh: ‎我是联邦调查局的罗杰·奥德姆探员

translation.en: So what can you tell me about the folks that robbed your bank?
Can you describe them for me physically? Anything?
translation.zh: ‎能不能描述一下他们的身体特征？ ‎任何信息都可以

translation.en: [grunts] No, no, can't. They were wearing masks.
translation.zh: ‎没办法描述 他们当时戴着面具

translation.en: Does the name "The Ghost Bandits" mean anything to you?
Yeah, I'm a bank manager.
They're the most notorious bank robbers in American history.
translation.zh:
‎幽灵强盗
‎是美国历史上最臭名昭著的银行劫匪

translation.en: They robbed over a hundred banks.
They move from state to state,
sometimes they disappear for years at a time.
translation.zh: ‎有时候会一下子消失好几年

translation.en: -Do you think-- -[mysterious music playing] Do you think it was… the Ghost Bandits that robbed this bank?
Everything in my gut tells me it's them.
Except one thing has been bugging me.
translation.zh: ‎但是有一件事我一直很疑惑

translation.en: How they gained access to your vault.
translation.zh: ‎他们是怎么进入你们金库的

translation.en: -[sobbing incoherently] -[Billy] It's all right, Owen. It's okay.
-[babbling] -[Billy] Breathe, breathe.
-There you go, in through your nose. -[Lilly] Blow it out.
translation.zh:
‎对 用鼻子吸气 ‎-对
‎-擤出来

translation.en: -Give it a big blow. Good boy. -[Billy] Blow, blow, blow.
translation.zh:
‎-擤出来
‎-用力擤出来 乖孩子

translation.en: -[blowing violently] -Jesus.
translation.zh:
‎-擤出来
‎-用力擤出来 乖孩子 ‎哎！

translation.en: Okay, you know what? We're done here, all right? That's enough.
translation.zh: ‎好的 到此为止 够了

translation.en: -You've probably had enough. -Very emotional.
translation.zh:
‎-你今天已经受够了
‎-太激动了

translation.en: Well done, Owen.
In case anything jogs your memory… the top number, 24/7.
translation.zh:
‎如果想到什么
‎随时打上面的号码找我

translation.en: The bottom number… don't call that one.
Do we think we might be a little more comfortable if someone was in the front seat?
translation.zh:
‎如果坐一个人到前排
‎会不会舒服一点？

translation.en: Nope.
-[Owen] Mmm. -We're here for you.
Yeah.
[Billy] Come on.
Bingo.
Whose car is this?
It's yours, Owen. It's all yours.
Isn't that nice? My parents got us a car without asking us first.
translation.zh:
‎真不错 是吧？ ‎爸妈问都没问我们
‎就给我们买了一辆车

translation.en: It's just a little wedding present.
We thought you deserved something better than that, uh, wussy wagon of yours.
So this is what you were doing all day? You were buying a hot rod?
translation.zh:
‎你们这一整天就是去干这个了啊？
‎去买肌肉车了？

translation.en: There's something about it that just screams Owen T. Browning.
translation.zh:
‎感觉这辆车
‎特别有欧文·布朗宁的感觉

translation.en: -Don't you agree? -Yeah! It's got your name all over it!
translation.zh:
‎-不是吗？
‎-是啊 特别适合你

translation.en: -I love it! Oh, yeah! -[Lilly laughing]
I love it, thank you. Um, I can't wait to drive it.
translation.zh:
‎我太喜欢了 谢谢你们
‎我真是迫不及待了

translation.en: -Want to take it for a spin now? -No.
I'm like 85% certain it's them. I have to tell Parker.
translation.zh: ‎我85%确定是他们 我得告诉帕克尔

translation.en: If you falsely accuse your fiancée's parents of robbing a bank,
translation.zh: ‎如果你错怪未婚妻父母抢银行

translation.en: that is relationship suicide!
So what am I supposed to do, hmm? Pretend like it didn't happen?
Hell, yes! Let me tell you something, I spent 80% of my life acting like shit didn't happen.
translation.zh:
‎没错 我跟你说
‎我这辈子80%时间都在假装没事

translation.en: Three weeks ago, I spilled some Lucky Charms in my bed,
translation.zh: ‎三周前 我把麦片弄洒在自己床上

translation.en: I still ain't said shit about it.
[laughs] And, besides, didn't you tell me you gave them the code to the vault?
translation.zh:
‎还有 ‎你不是说

translation.en: That's a big plane.
It's a wide plane.
Anyway, I became so obsessed with catching the Ghost Bandits
translation.zh: ‎我一心扑在抓捕幽灵强盗上

translation.en: that it cost me my marriage.
My house.
Maybe even my sanity.
I mean, after a while, I started wondering if the Ghost Bandits…
translation.zh: ‎查了一段时间之后 ‎我开始想 幽灵强盗会不会真的幽灵

translation.en: you know, were real ghosts.
translation.zh: ‎我开始想 幽灵强盗会不会真的幽灵

translation.en: Hey! Let's funnel this energy into getting Sheryl back!
translation.zh:
‎哎！
‎不如把这样的精力去把雪儿追回来

translation.en: Right? I can make a photo montage.
translation.zh: ‎对吧？我可以做一张合成照片

translation.en: Don't let this guy with this giant cock win over you!
-[sighs] Lock him up. -Wait, no! My wedding!
translation.zh:
‎-把他关起来
‎-等等 不要！我要结婚了！

translation.en: Oh, you're gonna have a wedding,
and quite the bachelor party in D block this weekend.
translation.zh: ‎还会有精彩的单身派对 ‎本周末在丁区监室办

translation.en: It wasn't me.
It was my in-laws.
They robbed my bank, and I did not help them.
translation.zh: ‎他们抢了我的银行 我没帮他们

translation.en: They used me.
Damn, boy, you flip quick.
translation.zh: ‎妈的 小子 你招得还真快

translation.en: Prove it. Put on a wire and get 'em to confess.
translation.zh:
‎证明给我看
‎戴上密录器让他们自己承认

translation.en: -You want me to be a rat? -I want you to do the right thing, Owen.
translation.zh: ‎你要我当内奸？ ‎我要你做对的事 欧文

translation.en: Clear your name, and help me catch the Ghost Bandits.
translation.zh:
‎洗清自己的名誉
‎并帮助我抓住幽灵强盗

translation.en: And also, yes, be a little bit of a rat.
[whispers] Parker.
-[door closes] -[whispers] Parker! Hey, Parker!
-[Parker] There you are! Where you been? -We have to talk.
-Why are you pinching your chest? -Because I'm wearing a--
[nervously] Whoa, gosh! A… soft shirt! Whoa! Feels like my fingers are at a finger spa.
translation.zh:
‎…穿的这件衬衫好软
‎感觉好像我的手指在做水疗

translation.en: -Really? Looks pretty starchy-- -Don't touch me!
translation.zh:
‎-看起来也不怎么样嘛…
‎-别碰我！

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's just…
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 ‎因为岳父母在婚礼前不可以碰新郎

translation.en: the in-laws aren't supposed to touch the groom before the wedding.
translation.zh: ‎因为岳父母在婚礼前不可以碰新郎

translation.en: -That's horseshit. -Are you high right now, Owen?
translation.zh:
‎-胡说八道
‎-你是不是吸毒了 欧文？

translation.en: I don't do illegal things, unlike other people.
translation.zh: ‎我不做违法的事 ‎和别人不一样

translation.en: Other people do… illegal things, and I'm cool with that too.
translation.zh: ‎别人会做违法的事 我也不介意

translation.en: And if we want to talk about that and just sort of get things off our chest…
translation.zh:
‎如果要谈这个问题 说说心里话
‎我也没意见

translation.en: Okay, uh, we gotta go, 'cause we gotta be at the bakery.
translation.zh:
‎好的 我们得走了
‎因为我们得去面包房

translation.en: The bakery! Yep! Okay, I think me and you should just go to the bakery,
translation.zh: ‎面包房 对 好的 咱们俩去面包房吧

translation.en: just because our baker died, we gotta get a new cake.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们的面包师去世了
‎我们得新做一个蛋糕

translation.en: Perhaps we should all just go together. One big happy family.
translation.zh:
‎要不我们还是一起去吧
‎欢乐的大家庭

translation.en: You guys don't wanna run errands.
translation.zh: ‎还是不要让你们为这些小事跑了

translation.en: I do.
Of course we do. Who doesn't like desserts?
translation.zh: ‎我们当然想去 谁不喜欢甜点呢？

translation.en: Well, they're vegan desserts, and we all know that they taste like shit.
translation.zh: ‎是全素甜点 ‎大家都知道很难吃

translation.en: I'm sorry, Parker, but I'm being honest with you.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 帕克尔 不过我和你说实话

translation.en: They taste like shit, okay?
So you guys should stay, we should go eat the shit. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎所以你们还是别去了 我们去尝 走吧

translation.en: [Parker on mic] As long as we leave now.
[Owen] Oh, we're all going. Cool, good. All right! Okay!
translation.zh:
‎-我们要迟到了
‎-我们都去？好吧 好的！

translation.en: [singsong] Okay! Oh, we're tasting cakes at 1308 Grant Avenue!
translation.zh:
‎好的！
‎我们去格兰特大道1308号品尝蛋糕！

translation.en: You know, when I go on a trip, I usually take two bags. I have a carry-on, then I check one too.
translation.zh:
‎我出门都会带两个包
‎手提一个 然后检查一下 一 二

translation.en: -[on mic] I check one, two. -Schmuck.
translation.zh: ‎然后检查一下 一 二 ‎笨蛋

translation.en: [Owen] You're driving! Billy McDermott is driving! Cool.
translation.zh:
‎你开车！
‎比利·麦克德莫特开车！真好

translation.en: Hey, do you want to play Never Have I Ever?
Never have I ever worn a scary mask when it wasn't Halloween.
translation.zh:
‎我从来没有戴过恐怖面具
‎万圣节除外

translation.en: Now your turn.
[Owen] We have arrived. I am one click south of the door.
translation.zh: ‎我们到了 就在店门南面

translation.en: You guys sure you don't wanna wait in the car? No? Okay.
translation.zh: ‎你们真的不要在车里等？好的

translation.en: We are zero clicks from the door. -I am opening the door. -[bell ringing]
translation.zh: ‎我们到了门前 我现在打开门

translation.en: -[Owen] Right this way, come on in. -[Billy] Go ahead. Smells good.
translation.zh:
‎-这边 请进
‎-好香啊 ‎-好香
‎-真不错

translation.en: Nice. Yep, that's cake.
translation.zh:
‎-好香
‎-真不错 ‎嗯 看见蛋糕了

translation.en: Welcome to Vegan Divas. Where you can get your cake--
translation.zh:
‎欢迎光临“全素天后”
‎这里为您制作蛋糕…

translation.en: -[door opens loudly] -And eat it too! I'm Kay.
translation.zh: ‎悉听尊便！ ‎我是凯伊 这是我姐姐艾达

translation.en: And this is my sister Ida.
translation.zh: ‎我是凯伊 这是我姐姐艾达

translation.en: She's the vegan and I'm the diva.
translation.zh: ‎她负责全素 我负责天后

translation.en: Thank you so much for fitting us in last minute.
translation.zh:
‎非常感谢你们
‎在最后一刻帮我们准备蛋糕

translation.en: -Yep. -Don't even worry about it.
translation.zh: ‎没事 我很理解最后一刻这件事

translation.en: I totally get last minute. I'm never on time for anything.
translation.zh: ‎没事 我很理解最后一刻这件事 ‎我做什么事都不准时

translation.en: Are you sure about this? [laughs]
[whispers] Our wedding is at a very specific time.
No, it's okay. The reviews were great.
translation.zh: ‎不 没事 他们的评论很好

translation.en: -This is just their shtick. -[head bangs]
[Kay on mic] Why do I keep doing that? [Ida] Hey, I think you might be bleeding.
translation.zh:
‎-我怎么老是这样 艾达？
‎-凯伊 你可能在流血

translation.en: -[Kay] Ida! -[Ida] Okay, I'm sorry.
-[Kay] Cake! Hurry! -[Ida] Okay.
So this is our Better-Than-Sex red velvet cake
translation.zh: ‎这是我们的“超越性爱”红丝绒蛋糕

translation.en: that Ida makes from scratch.
And that name is no lie.
I've compared them both.
Mmm! And this is vegan?
Oh, yeah.
[softly] Parker, can I speak with you in private real quick?
translation.zh: ‎帕克尔 能和你私下说两句吗？很快

translation.en: What's wrong?
-I like to concur… -What? Sure. …about, you know, important life decisions before we make them.
translation.zh:
‎-啊？好的
‎-重要的人生决定 我们要商量一致

translation.en: -You know? Mmm-hmm. -Really?
-You have a little something here. -What's that, sweetheart?
translation.zh:
‎-你这里有点东西
‎-什么 亲爱的？

translation.en: What the fuck?
I'm sorry! I didn't know you guys were together!
translation.zh: ‎对不起！我不知道你们是一对

translation.en: [laughs] Owen, what's going on?
Okay, I know this is gonna sound crazy, but the FBI thinks
translation.zh: ‎我知道说出来你会觉得很离谱 ‎联邦调查局认为我和劫案有关

translation.en: -I had something to do with the robbery. -What?
translation.zh: ‎联邦调查局认为我和劫案有关

translation.en: -They made me wear-- -[doors open]
Oh! What a lovely little bakery.
-You must be Parker! -Hi.
-[Parker yelps] -[all clamoring]
translation.zh:
‎-你来这里干什么？
‎-谁都不要乱来！

translation.en: -[loudly] Ah! Nobody make a scene! -You're the one with the gun, Rehan.
translation.zh:
‎-你来这里干什么？
‎-谁都不要乱来！ ‎拿着枪的人是你 瑞涵

translation.en: Yes, you are the one with the gun holding hostages right now…
translation.zh: ‎对 现在是你拿着枪 ‎在面包房里劫持多名人质

translation.en: -[on mic] …inside of the bakery. -[gags] Oh, hostages!
translation.zh: ‎在面包房里劫持多名人质 ‎人质！

translation.en: -What the hell is going on? -Listen, Rehan.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么回事？
‎-听我说 瑞涵 我们说了会弄钱给你

translation.en: -We told you we'd get you the money. -Oh, yes. No, you did.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么回事？
‎-听我说 瑞涵 我们说了会弄钱给你 ‎噢 对 没错
‎但我记得你们说话不算数

translation.en: But then I remembered you are liars.
translation.zh:
‎噢 对 没错
‎但我记得你们说话不算数

translation.en: Just in case you were planning on slithering away into the shadows again,
I thought I'd come here for a little… -insurance. -[Parker yelps]
-[Rehan] Come along, Parker. -Hey, hey, hey! Just take me instead.
translation.zh:
‎-走吧 帕克尔
‎-哎！拿我换她

translation.en: Take me!
You little Build-A-Bear? You think you're hostage material?
translation.zh:
‎你这熊熊工作室小子？
‎你觉得你有资格当人质吗？

translation.en: No one here gives two shits whether you live or die!
Look at them and check in with them.
translation.zh: ‎看看他们 了解一下情况

translation.en: Oh! Zero shits given.
I don't understand. Was Owen right?
Just do what she says.
Stay calm, baby. Just stay calm.
translation.zh: ‎冷静 宝贝 冷静一点

translation.en: So emo! Getting choked up.
translation.zh: ‎情绪都起来了 哭得快喘不过气来了

translation.en: -Dad? Dad? -I like getting choked, though.
translation.zh:
‎-爸？
‎-不过我就喜欢喘不过气来

translation.en: You can eat my cake anytime!
translation.zh: ‎随时欢迎你来吃我的圆面包！

translation.en: Please, God, save my fiancée who is exiting the back of the bakery right now.
translation.zh: ‎神啊 救救我的未婚妻吧 ‎她正从面包店后门走出

translation.en: FBI! Freeze!
God'll save you, Parker!
[whining loudly] Please! God, please! Please! Please, God!
Ahh! Oh! Oh, shit!
Come on, Roger! You got this, Roger! Be a man, you dickhead!
translation.zh:
‎振作起来 罗杰！你行的 罗杰！
‎要有男子汉的样子 混蛋！

translation.en: -[shrieking continues on mic] -God, man!
-[Parker] Fuck you! -[Rehan] Go on, take her!
Get the fuck in! Get in the car!
I'm going after her.
What the fuck? Oh, son of a bitch.
Everything's fucking cake in here!
I'm going after her!
No! You're gonna get yourself killed! Get down! Get down!
You're really fuckin' getting on my tits!
-[music stops] -Shut up!
Lilly! Lilly, the front!
Let's go.
Go for the tires.
[Rehan] Get me my fucking money!
Ah, shit.
I fucking love this job!
-[loud bang] -[Rehan] Motherfuckers!
[Oldham] Freeze!
[Billy] What?
Put your guns down.
Put 'em down now.
-They got our daughter. -Don't move!
-[Billy] Motherfucker! -[groaning]
You! You were supposed to protect her!
This is why people don't trust the federal government.
translation.zh: ‎所以大家才不信任联邦政府！

translation.en: This is on you! Hey! Hey!
Let me in! Hey, let me in!
No, no, no, no, no!
Let me in! Let me in!
-Okay, I committed. [grunting] -[engine revving]
What happened?
-[Billy] Oh, Jesus. -[Owen] Ow!
[Billy] Come on, get your ass out here. There you go.
Ahh! Why are we stopped? We gotta go after her!
-I know where that woman lives! -Rehan has houses everywhere.
translation.zh:
‎我知道那女人住在哪里 ‎瑞涵到处都有房子
‎根本不知道她把帕克尔带去了哪里

translation.en: We have no idea where she took Parker.
translation.zh:
‎瑞涵到处都有房子
‎根本不知道她把帕克尔带去了哪里

translation.en: [Billy] Even if you did, what were you gonna do?
translation.zh: ‎即便你知道 你又能怎么样？

translation.en: Sneak into the bushes and get chased up a tree by a pack of tiny dogs?
translation.zh:
‎偷偷钻进灌木丛
‎然后被一群小狗追上树？

translation.en: Parker is in the wind.
-I'm sorry. -Well, what are we gonna do now?
The first thing we're gonna do is you're gonna take that fucking wire off.
translation.zh: ‎第一件事就是你把他妈密录器拆掉

translation.en: [Billy] You little shit bag.
I knew you were a coward but I didn't take you to be a rat.
translation.zh:
‎我早就知道你没胆子
‎但没想到你居然会当内奸

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, but I'm not gonna take the fall for you guys!
translation.zh: ‎对不起 但你们别把责任推到我身上

translation.en: We never asked you to.
No! You just framed me!
translation.zh: ‎没错！你们只是嫁祸给我罢了

translation.en: You put bank-robbing evidence in the trunk of my car!
translation.zh:
‎你们把抢银行的证据
‎放在我车的后备箱里！

translation.en: He wouldn't have been convicted of anything!
It was just enough to tie him up
and save Parker from making the biggest mistake of her life.
translation.zh: ‎免得帕克尔犯下人生中最大的错误

translation.en: [yelling] She just got kidnapped because of you!
Before you came back in her life, the worst thing that happened to Parker?
translation.zh:
‎在你们回来之前
‎帕克尔遇到最麻烦的事是什么？

translation.en: She burned the roof of her mouth on a home-made flatbread.
I would've blown on it, but I couldn't. I had a cold.
translation.zh:
‎我原本可以把饼吹凉 但没办法
‎我当时感冒了

translation.en: How could you guys possibly know what she wants?
translation.zh:
‎你们怎么可能知道
‎她想要什么、需要什么？

translation.en: Or needs? You weren't there!
translation.zh:
‎你们怎么可能知道
‎她想要什么、需要什么？ ‎你们根本不在！

translation.en: Because we were trying to fucking protect her, that's why!
translation.zh: ‎因为我们他妈是为了保护她！

translation.en: Rehan used to be our partner.
She would choose the bank and clean the money.
And then she started to fuckin' lose it!
We were afraid she would find out about Parker.
translation.zh: ‎我们当时害怕她会知道帕克尔

translation.en: So on the last job, we just took the money and ran.
translation.zh:
‎所以在干最后一票的时候
‎我们就拿钱跑了

translation.en: I don't give a shit. I don't care what happened, okay?
translation.zh: ‎不关我的事 ‎我不关心发生了什么 好吗？

translation.en: -I just care about getting Parker back. -Oh, yeah, you and me both.
translation.zh: ‎我只关心怎么把帕克尔救回来 ‎嗯 彼此彼此

translation.en: You need five million in two days. So you're gonna rob another bank, right?
translation.zh: ‎你们需要在两天内筹到500万 ‎所以要再抢一间银行 对吧？

translation.en: Wouldn't hurt to have a bank manager on the team.
translation.zh: ‎有一位银行经理加入团队不会有坏处

translation.en: Someone who knows the bank's weaknesses, which ones have excess cash holdings,
translation.zh:
‎知道银行的弱点
‎哪些银行有超量现金

translation.en: when and where they move that cash.
He gets nervous cracking an egg. You think he can rob a bank?
translation.zh:
‎他敲鸡蛋都紧张
‎你觉得他能抢银行？

translation.en: If it's to save Parker? Fuck yeah, I'll rob a bank!
translation.zh: ‎为了救帕克尔 抢银行就抢银行！

translation.en: We always knew they were criminals.
[whispers] They drink during the day.
Yeah. Yeah. Hey, and the daughter… is a yoga instructor.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 而且女儿是瑜伽教练

translation.en: I'm not saying anything, but, you know, connect the dots.
translation.zh: ‎也不是我说什么 ‎但是要把这些连在一起看

translation.en: Do you have any idea where they might've gone?
Does Owen have any access to a family cabin or anything like that?
translation.zh:
‎家里有没有小屋什么的？
‎欧文会不会去那里？

translation.en: A, um, a vacation home--
Vacation home? What, are you kidding me?
Who do we look like, The Jeffersons?
translation.zh: ‎我们像“杰佛逊一家”那种有钱人吗？

translation.en: Here's a list of all the banks within a 100-mile radius,
translation.zh: ‎这是160公里半径内所有银行的清单

translation.en: arranged by on-site cash holdings, from ValueBank all the way up to--
translation.zh:
‎按行内现金存量排序
‎从价值银行到现金最多的…

translation.en: Atlas Reserve, 20 million dollars.
-One-stop shopping. -Hmm! Easy.
[laughing] Yeah, I wish!
-[Billy] No? -No.
We can't rob Atlas Reserve.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能抢阿特拉斯储备银行

translation.en: Phoebe King has that place on lock.
Who's Phoebe King?
I thought you guys were the Ghost Bandits. You don't know who Phoebe King is?
translation.zh:
‎你们不是幽灵强盗吗？
‎居然不知道菲比·金？

translation.en: -She pioneered bandit barriers. -[upbeat music playing]
[Owen] Every inch of her bank is triple secured.
translation.zh: ‎她的银行的每一寸角落都有三层防护

translation.en: I'd fuck me.
And her vault?
I'm talking biometrics, weight sensitivity,
translation.zh: ‎生物特征识别 重量感应

translation.en: not to mention randomized time locks! [laughing] Okay?
translation.zh: ‎更不用说随机时间锁了 好吗？

translation.en: When did you make this?
When I walked to the vending machine, got a Diet Squirt.
translation.zh:
‎我朝自动售卖机走过去时
‎买了一罐低糖汽水

translation.en: Weirdly, I had a lot of it in my pockets.
translation.zh: ‎很奇怪 我口袋里有很多

translation.en: So, let me get this straight.
You made a model of a bank we're not gonna rob?
translation.zh:
‎我们不抢这家银行
‎但你却做了一个模型？

translation.en: Oh, wow. There's another one. He made two.
translation.zh: ‎还有一个 他做了两个模型

translation.en: I made 12. Only two are presentable.
translation.zh: ‎我做了12个 只有两个像样

translation.en: See, we don't want a Phoebe King.
What we need is Victory Union, a bank whose manager is lazy.
translation.zh: ‎抢胜利联合银行才对 ‎这家银行的经理很懒

translation.en: A total turd.
-What we need is a Vince Millen. -[upbeat music continues]
Vince lost his right testicle because, one time,
translation.zh:
‎文斯右侧睾丸没了 ‎因为有一次
‎他过于用力地坐在了自己的蛋蛋上

translation.en: he sat on his nuts too hard.
translation.zh:
‎因为有一次
‎他过于用力地坐在了自己的蛋蛋上

translation.en: [Owen] The reason he got hired is 'cause his dad owns the bank.
translation.zh:
‎聘他当经理
‎只是因为他爸爸是银行老板

translation.en: [man] Okay.
[Owen] The most important thing about Vince is that he cuts corners.
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是文斯喜欢走捷径

translation.en: Federal regulations limit how much cash a branch can hold for security and insurance purposes.
translation.zh:
‎出于安全及保险的目的
‎联邦法规对分行现金存量有限制

translation.en: When you go over the limit,
a manager has to arrange for a cash pick-up from the vault.
translation.zh: ‎经理必须安排从金库提取现金

translation.en: [Vince] Yo, lock up for me. I got paintball.
translation.zh: ‎帮我锁一下 我要去打漆弹

translation.en: Now, the armored truck is supposed to take the cash directly to the repository,
translation.zh: ‎运钞车应当将现金直接运去存放点

translation.en: but Vince hates paperwork.
So he has the same armored truck
collect cash from all three branches he manages
translation.zh: ‎从他管理的三间分行取现金

translation.en: before going to the repository.
So if we hit that truck after the pickup from the third branch…
translation.zh:
‎所以在运钞车从第三间分行取现金后
‎抢运钞车…

translation.en: -It's like robbing three banks in one. -[Owen claps]
-We just need disguises. -[Owen] Yep.
And I need a gun.
-What? Oh, my gosh. -Mmm-hmm.
-It's way lighter than I thought it'd be. -It's a water gun.

translation.en: What the fuck do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: ‎你他妈知道自己在干什么吗？

translation.en: Did they give me a fuckin' water gun again?
translation.zh: ‎他们又他妈给了我一把水枪？

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Holy fucking shit!
[RJ muted] Whoa! My cuz is a straight-up murderer!
Oh! Oh, God! Parker.
-Owen, are you okay? -Parker, Parker, Parker! Oh, my God.
-[Parker exclaims] -Parker! Are you okay?
-[Parker] Yeah. -Are you okay? Oh, my God.
-Oh, you… -[car approaching]
-My God, what happened? -[Owen] I don't know.
I got sweat on my gun so I thought it was a squirt gun.
translation.zh: ‎我的汗流到枪上 所以以为是水枪

translation.en: -It wasn't. It was a bullet gun. -What?
translation.zh:
‎其实确实真枪实弹 ‎-啊？
‎-什么鬼？

translation.en: What the fuck? You guys are bank robbers? You've been lying to me my entire life?
translation.zh: ‎你们是银行劫匪？瞒了我一辈子？

translation.en: We're trying to protect you, baby. That's why we don't see you.
translation.zh:
‎我们是想保护你 宝贝
‎所以才不来看你

translation.en: -We're trying to keep you safe. -And what about Owen, huh?
translation.zh:
‎-我们是为了你的安全
‎-那欧文呢？

translation.en: You dragged him into it. What if he'd gotten killed?
translation.zh:
‎你们把他拉下了水
‎要是他送了命怎么办？

translation.en: You… You couldn't have held him back if you tried. Really?
You're the most important person in the world to me, so…
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 你是全世界最重要的人

translation.en: He's a top man, he… he did really well.
translation.zh: ‎他确实很厉害 表现得很好

translation.en: I've… I've grown fond of you.
You did good.
Here you go.
Nah, put that hand away.
-We're family. -What?
-I didn't use tongue. -I did.
-[sirens wailing] -Uh-oh. Here we go, showtime.
We dragged every cop in the city here. Go on, skedaddle.
translation.zh:
‎城里所有的警察都被我们引过来了
‎赶紧走

translation.en: You don't want to be in jail on your wedding day.
-Move it. -[Owen] Love you.
-[RJ] Ow! -[Owen] Let's go! Come on.
Billy and Lilly McDermott, I finally caught you!
translation.zh:
‎比利和莉利·麦克德莫特
‎我终于抓到你们了

translation.en: -[rock music fading] -Is the danger over?
God, you suck.
-[Kay] Hurry, Ida! -I'm trying. -[Kay] Hurry up! -I'm trying.
translation.zh:
‎-快点 艾达
‎-我在加快速度

translation.en: Look, let me tell you somethin', I've been doing bank security for years.
translation.zh: ‎我从事银行安全工作很多年了

translation.en: What people don't realize, it's all about prevention. You gotta keep your head on a swivel.
translation.zh:
‎大家没有意识到预防最重要
‎要随时保持警觉

translation.en: That's what I do, I see everything in that bank.
translation.zh:
‎我就是这样做的
‎银行里的一切 我都洞若观火

translation.en: If somebody gonna rob it, that's on me, baby. [laughing]
translation.zh: ‎要是有人抢银行 就是我的责任 宝贝

translation.en: But also I gotta get a new job, 'cause I quit.
translation.zh:
‎不过我找了一份新工作
‎因为我辞职了

translation.en: [boy] You got him!
-Oh, she's having an allergic reaction! -Is there nickel in this spoon?
-Oh, dear, I guess one slipped through. -Oh, she'll be all right.
translation.zh:
‎-可能漏了一个进来
‎-她没事的

translation.en: Don't worry, everybody chill! I got this!
translation.zh: ‎没事 大家别急 有我在！

translation.en: Yeah! I'm not a hero. I'm just an EMT.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我不是英雄 只是急救员罢了

translation.en: Oh, shit. This won't help.
But you're vaccinated!
-[laughing] I'll be right back. -[Margie] Aunt Linda--
Husband.
Yes, my wife?
Thank you.
For everything. This has been… one hell of a week.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你所做的一切 ‎这一周真是忙坏了

translation.en: Of course.
-I love you. -I love you.
[Gary on mic] And now, ladies and gentlemen,
for the first time as a married couple,
-Owen and Parker Browning! -[both] Whoo!
[RJ] Aw, you look so good.
What are you doing here?
You can't let a simple little thing like going to prison get in the way of your daughter's wedding, now can you?
translation.zh:
‎蹲监狱这种小事
‎怎么能妨碍女儿的婚礼呢？

translation.en: Did you guys break out?
They get one dance and one slice of cake.
translation.zh: ‎他们可以跳一支舞 吃一块蛋糕

translation.en: [Lilly] We made a deal.
We pled guilty, and then we tracked down an old friend of his.
translation.zh: ‎我们认罪并帮他找一个老朋友

translation.en: -Wait, is that Sheryl? -Oh, yeah.
-May I? -Of course.
Come on, sugar. Come to Mama. Let's show 'em how to do it.
translation.zh:
‎来吧 宝贝 到妈妈这里来
‎让他们看看怎么跳

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
I'm happy for him.
Me too.
-I mean, prison? -Well…
Okay, but it's nice they could show up.
[Billy] Hold up.
Oh, yeah! Everyone's getting pregnant tonight!
They robbed our bank the other day.
Held me at gunpoint. This shit is really fucked up.
translation.zh: ‎用枪指着我 好他妈离谱

translation.en: I got this piece especially for you.
Oh, that's very kind of you, Owen. Thank you. [chuckling]
[softly] Don't chip a tooth.
Good lad.
'Cause there's something inside of it.
-Yeah, we did get it. We're fine. -Okay.
-[whispers] It's a paperclip. -[Lilly] Okay.
-[Owen] I left the key in the Hellcat. -Shut up.
translation.zh:
‎-我把车钥匙留在跑车里了
‎-闭嘴

translation.en: -I got it. I got it. -Okay. All right, enjoy.
Have a bite.
-["All The Small Things" continues] -[Billy] Game on.
